rpg.item

Interface Parent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Anchor, BackPack, Container, Purse

    public interface Parent
    A class of parents A parent can contain one or more items
    Author:
    Mathias, Frederic

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canAddItem(Item item)
      Check whether the given item can be added to this parent.
      boolean containsDirectItem(Item item)
      Check whether this parent contains the given item
      Creature getHolder()
      Return the direct or indirect creature who is the holder of this parent
      void removeDirectItem(Item item)
      Remove the given item from the content of this parent

    • Method Detail

      • getHolder

        Creature getHolder()
        Return the direct or indirect creature who is the holder of this parent

      • canAddItem

        @Raw
boolean canAddItem(@Raw
                     Item item)
        Check whether the given item can be added to this parent.
        Returns:
        False if the given item is ineffective. | if( item == null) | result == false False if the item this anchor contains is effective. | if (getItem() != null) then | result == false Otherwise false if the given item is an instance of item implementation and has a parent. | if( item instanceof ItemImplementation && ((ItemImplementation)item).hasParent() ) then | result == false Otherwise false if the holder can't accept the given item. | if( !getHolder().canAddItem(item) ) then | result == false

      • containsDirectItem

        @Raw
boolean containsDirectItem(@Raw
                             Item item)
        Check whether this parent contains the given item
        Parameters:
        item - The item to check for
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - [must] If the given item is not effective | item == null

      • removeDirectItem

        void removeDirectItem(Item item)
                      throws NoSuchItemException,
                             IllegalArgumentException
        Remove the given item from the content of this parent
        Parameters:
        item - The item to remove from the content of this parent
        Throws:
        NoSuchItemException - [must] This anchor doesn't contain the given item | !contains(item)
        IllegalArgumentException - [must] The given item is not effective or the given item is an item implementation and has a parent. | item == null
